roleset.name: vaccinating again
roleset.note: REVACCINATION-N NOTES: Relation to verb-vaccinate.01. (from revaccination.01-n)

example.name: revaccinate-v
example.text: [When she was about 8 years old]-2, [Marie, now 67]-1, recalls being vaccinated *-1 against the measles *-2.

example.name: revaccination-n
example.text: While revaccination of older adults has been recommended, clinical efficacy has not yet been proven.
